needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are: trees (of hunter-gatherers thrive in groups of a certain size), individual initiative (founders and early employees are meant to work independently), freedom of action (programmers often find that working in groups makes them feel stifled), and something like high fructose corn syrup (or junk food) to make it appealing (programmers don't have to write new code every day), and a strong work culture (the restrictiveness of big company jobs can lead to malaise in founders and early employees, who are essentially living as humans are meant to).
